title: Category-based TermVectors
description:
This is a simple RequestHandler that extracts significant Terms from TermVectors wrt some categorical or class value.  Think keywords per class.  Minimal SolrCloud support is available including distributed tf*idf.

**Following Yonik's Law** 
This is patch is more of a placeholder for a much more polished draft.  Among other things, test scripts and javadocs are forthcoming!
